show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #51 George Walker Multispecies Grazing in Minnesota
subtitle: #51 George Walker Multispecies Grazing in Minnesota
summary:
Long time facebook fan, friend and podcast listener George Walker joins me from the frozen north of Minnesota to discuss what tools he learned in Minot ND at a recent Ranching for Profit school.
As usual, we take a trip through the past to unpack the journey of our guest and chase many rabbit trails along the way.

Connect with George on Facebook
